has_limitations: ['Afforestation implies a transformation of land use from non-forest to forest, in accordance with the FAO definition of afforestation.', 'Afforestation may cover past afforestation as long as it takes place in the period between the planting of the trees and the time when the land use is recognised as a forest.', 'The economic activities in this category are limited to NACE II 02.10, 02.20, 02.30, and 02.40.']

['The afforestation plan must cover a duration of at least five years or the minimum period prescribed in national law.', 'The forest management plan or equivalent instrument must cover a period of 10 years or more.', 'The activity must not involve the degradation of land with high carbon stock.', 'Forest holdings under 13ha are not required to perform a climate benefit analysis.']
['The use of pesticides is reduced and alternative approaches or techniques are favoured.', 'The activity minimises the use of fertilisers and does not use manure.']

['There is no conversion of habitats specifically sensitive to biodiversity loss or with high conservation value.', 'Excluding the use or release of invasive alien species.', 'Excluding the use of non-native species unless certain conditions are met.']
